vote.title: Authorize Supplemental Agreement No. 8 to the professional services contract with Halff Associates, Inc. for additional engineering and construction phase services associated with the Mill Creek, Peaks Branch, and State-Thomas Drainage Relief Tunnel - Not to exceed $2,449,000.00, from $24,058,488.00 to $26,507,488.00 - Financing: Flood Protection and Storm Drainage Facilities Fund (2006 General Obligation Bond Funds)
